title: OBS Lag / FPS drop / Windows 10 version 1803 April Update

embed.description: Windows updated yesterday to the april update 1803. Now when I open OBS and for example csgo my FPS drop to 90/150 without obs open is 350/400. Game feels terrible like everything is slow. Yesterday before the windows update everything worked flawless. This problem happened before with...

body:
Hi Guys,
If you are a streamer using OBS and recently noticed lag and fps drop it might be related to the Windows 10 April update.
I have also tried another streaming software such as GameShow and i still get the lags.
Just in case someone else out there is having this issue.
Sadly the fix on the OBS site didn't work for me, if anyone found a way to get it working again let me know.
Cheers

replies.body:
Hey :) 
I haven't streamed in a while but I found OBS had a lot of issues with FPS lag for me with any game that I played. 
Have you tried running [Bebo](https://bebo.com/)? Its still in alpha so its a lil buggy but honestly runs so much smoother than anything else.
